sen.j: 宗像氏業（むなかたうじなり）は、宗像大社の第47代大宮司である。
sen.e: Ujinari MUNAKATA was the 47th Daiguji (the supreme priest) of the Munakata Taisha Shrine.
Ujinari MUNAKATA was the 47th Daiguji (the supreme priest) of the Munakata Taisha Shrine.
